trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip" /> event.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs" /> class.
The event handler to invoke.
The target on which the handler is invoked.
Invokes the specified event handler on the specified object.
This implementation casts the generic handler to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventHandler> instance and invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventHandler>執行個體，並叫用它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal offset from the specified horizontal placement.
The amount to offset the KeyTip horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 要水平位移 KeyTip 的數量。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that either evaluates to negative or positive infinity, or is not a number.
Gets or sets the horizontal placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
The horizontal placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 放置目標項目相對 KeyTip 水平位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical offset from the specified vertical placement.
The amount to offset the KeyTip vertically.
trans-unit.target: 要垂直位移 KeyTip 的數量。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that either evaluates to negative or positive infinity, or is not a number.
Gets or sets the vertical placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
The vertical placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 放置目標項目相對 KeyTip 垂直放置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the KeyTip is displayed and accessible.
The value that indicates whether the KeyTip is displayed and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出 KeyTip 是否顯示，而且可存取。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>, the KeyTip is visible and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>，KeyTip 是可見和可存取。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Hidden>, the KeyTip is hidden but still accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Hidden>，KeyTip 是隱藏的但仍然可以存取。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Collapsed>, the KeyTip is not visible and not accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs.KeyTipVisibility%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Collapsed>，KeyTip 不可見，且無法存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user interface element that serves as the target for placing the KeyTip.
The element that serves as the target for placing the KeyTip.
trans-unit.target: 做為放置 KeyTip 的目標項目。
